span.span: As of now, NCS is going to follow Mayor de Blasio and the Department of Education’s guidance and will be closed until the end of the 2019 – 2020 School Year

p.span: It is with great excitement that NCS launch our Remote Learning Platform. Our goal is to ensure the continuation of scholar learning, engagement, and community. We aim to keep students on track so that when they return to school, they will be ready for the next phase in their learning.

p.strong: You may access NCS’s Remote Learning Platform by clicking here, or by going to the following web address: https://sites.google.com/ncschools.org/distancelearning

p.span: Providing that we open in September, we wanted to share a few important dates in the 20-21 school year. While we are hopeful that these dates will remain fixed, we appreciate your flexibility in the event the following dates need to be adjusted.
8/28 – First day of school for K (half day)

Starting Monday, March 23rd, grab and go meals will only be available at the sites listed below. Grab and go meals will be available in the main building entrance from 7:30am-1:30pm. Students 18 and under may pick up one breakfast and two lunch meals. Please note that these sites may change over time. We will notify you if there are any changes.
